item.title: Notes for SwiftUI and Combine Programming (1)
item.description: I start reading onevcat new book SwiftUI and Combine Programming (a great book to learning SwiftUI if you can read Chinese). I decided to put all the interest parts and notes in here.

item.title: Running Oh-My-Zsh inside Spacemacs
item.description: When I start using Spacemacs, I was hoping there is a way to using my own configured zsh inside the Spacemacs workflow, after a look through the documentation, of course we can do it
